text: This week's topic for #DDawareness2021 is...people with disabilities and the #COVID19 #vaccine. 💉 A good place to start is @public_rep's webinar on Tuesday, March 9 from 6-7:30PM ▶️ COVID-19 Vaccines & The Disability Community Question & Answer Session https://t.co/crPnGI60VT https://t.co/AbKVMhYTUY
